name: Marco Gasca
text: I treated my wife to her first Papa John's hand tossed supreme. She absolutely loves it. Pizza Hut can't beat it!

name: Aaron Benavidez
text:
RAW. Got a supreme and the green peppers were LIME GREEN. The ham was ROOM temperature! Not to mention the person to deliver the pizza called to ask for more explanation to were to deliver when. I entered my exact room number#
1/5

name: Victor M Martinez
text: Amazing! There ingredients are all natural and tasty!

name: Vitor CP
text: My wife loved it.  It'd the best tasting pizza

name: Ric Ya
text: Tacos at Taco. Palenque were  not  good..meat was dry and over cooked..so much for the talk of South Texas  earring places...save your money

name: J B
text: Got my order wrong. I called to let them know and was told they would deliver the correct pizza. Never got the pizza. Called them again to check the status and they kept answering and hanging up the phone. Worst service and they never seem to get orders right.

name: Leena Suresh
text: best pizza, can't beat the price, awesome deals

name: Oscar Leal
text: Good pizza, great prices

name: Jon H on
text: Worst pizza I have ever had and wing are undercooked

name: Luis Caballero
text: Took an hour and a forty or delivery, the store wouldn't answer the phone when we called after an hour and a quarter, and the driver delivered claiming both he and the manager were calling us to notify us of the delay.. when confronted with …More

name: Rosa Bustinza
text: Kids love their pizza and I like that they deliver.

name: Bill Haugeberg
text: Messed up my order, waited for a new pizza that still wasn’t correct. Try any other competitor for competent service.

name: Sarah Zepeda
text: This is what pizza should taste like.  The sauce is the best. Also fast delivery, we were tired of waiting 1 hour for a greasy pizza from their competitor.

name: Jose Salinas
text: Friendly people, fast service overall very satisfied

name: lupe ramos
text: Pizza hut tastes sour w fake bread, dominoes is cool if I'm out of the delivery zone, but popajohns is always on point. Good job ladies and gentlemen.

name: carlos delgado
text: Great pizza! Great service!

name: Oscar Garza
text: Pizza is good

name: Alma Aldape
text: It was delish!!!

name: Alex Daniel
text: Loved that pizza

name: Sarah Zepeda
text: The best pizza in town

name: David Vallado
text: My favorite pizza

name: chiquis medina
text: Never been there

name: Gregory Sprinkle
text: Just love pappa johns pizza

name: linda maganda
text: Excellent pizzas!

name: Kimberly Latigo
text: Reasonable price

name: David Scheiber
text: Great pizza

name: Jose Razo
text: This is the only Papa Johns in Brownsville, and they have only manage to get my order right one time. I have been their several time to give them the benefit of the doubt.

name: Carmen Hernandez
text: They take long time to get my order

name: González R Susana
text: (Translated by Google) Wait in line 17 minutes better get to another pizzeria bad service. Maybe they need more staff …More

text:
